name: Henki
description:
Welcome to Kaina. Here death awaits you. You are Henki creature, who, after the death of his body, can still fight back and swallow someone else's soul by restoring his body. But this does not matter, because in Cain you can easily destroy the soul. Stay as long as possible to please the ghost of Kaina.

Developer: Mina aka Polar4ik (PRL4K🌸#6727)
Compositer: Saigo no-nozomi (Saigo no-nozomi#1206) Control:
WASD - Move
Left Button Mouse - Hit
Right Button Mouse - Magic
Esc - Exit *opg - OpenGL Version(If there are no Vulcan drivers) (Sorry for the graphical errors they will soon be corrected)
